items.sentence: Tom started singing, and we all left the room.
You can come whenever it's convenient for you.
Why didn't you stay in Boston a little longer?
It's a pity that you'll never know who it was.
Tom didn't say what kind of bicycle he wanted.
Don't let Tom do anything you think is unsafe.
Can you locate where we are on the map for me?
Have you been to the Canadian embassy website?
Don't worry. We have plenty of food and water.
When was the last time you kissed your mother?
My mother isn't very strict, but my father is.
When did you have this passport picture taken?
Don't pay more for something than you have to.
I don't think doing that'll be worth our time.
I don't think I'll have time for that anymore.
I'm not sure that this translation is correct.
I have a feeling that Tom is going to be late.
Addressing one's boss as "omae" is unheard of.
We don't go out to eat as often as we used to.
How much does it cost to get to Boston by bus?
